bringing_ideas_to_life: Bringing Your Ideas to Life Through Software
ronfic_desc: As a software developer, I specialize in designing and building cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter, ensuring high performance and maintainability. I collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop scalable solutions, troubleshoot complex issues, and optimize applications for efficiency. My role includes leading code reviews, integrating third-party APIs, and staying updated on emerging technologies to enhance development practices. I also work closely with clients to translate business needs into technical solutions, contributing to the full software development lifecycle from planning to deployment.
compass_x_desc: As a Flutter Developer, I designed and developed high-performance mobile applications using the Flutter framework, focusing on scalability and maintainability. I collaborated closely with designers, backend developers, and stakeholders to deliver feature-rich applications on time. My responsibilities included writing efficient, well-structured code, implementing robust debugging and testing strategies, and optimizing app performance. I conducted code reviews, ensured best practices in development, and stayed updated with emerging technologies. Additionally, I provided technical guidance to clients, aligning solutions with business needs, and played a key role in the entire development lifecycle, from ideation to deployment.
dsu_exp1: Mentored junior students in C++ programming, providing guidance on core concepts, best practices, and algorithmic problem-solving. Assisted in debugging, optimizing code, and building projects, helping students develop strong logical thinking and coding proficiency.
dsu_exp2: Assisted in delivering the “Raspberry Pi and IoT” course by supporting both lectures and hands-on lab sessions, helping students grasp IoT concepts, hardware integration, and practical implementation.
dsu_exp3: Oversaw the management and regular updates of the center’s official website, ensuring content accuracy, functionality, and seamless user experience.
dsu_exp4: Provided guidance to junior students in learning and developing proficiency in C++ programming, focusing on fundamental concepts, problem-solving, and best coding practices.
dsu_exp5: Served as a liaison between the office and students, facilitating clear communication, addressing concerns, and ensuring smooth coordination while effectively leading the group.
bachelor_of_science: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
master_of_science: Master of Science in Computer Engineering
